classes.dict_class module¶

class classes.dict_class.Word(item)¶

Bases: object

Class to save word and the number of it’s repeats in dictionary.

class classes.dict_class.WordsDict(lst=[])¶

Bases: object

Class for saving and getting word that meets more often.

append(item)¶

Method to add words to the dictionary. It’s the way how the dictionary should be formed. :param item: The item that should be added :type item: any type :return: None

get_first_n_words(n)¶

Method to get the list of n Word objects that meet more often . :param n: number of objects to return :type n: int :return: list of Word objects, length of the list is n :rtype: list

get_list_of_n_words(n)¶

Method to get the list of words that meet more often . :param n: number of words to return :type n: int :return: list, length of the list is n :rtype: list
